articles.title: New products, services unveiled at supply chain expo in Beijing, facilitating tech commercialization
articles.author: Chi Jingyi
articles.summary: At the China International Supply Chain Expo (CISCE), BGI Group debuted new genetic testing services, while Sinosoft Technology Group unveiled AI-powered compliance solutions. CETL, a CATL subsidiary, introduced a pure electric fishing boat, and BTR New Material Group launched a new graphite anode material designed to improve electric vehicle battery performance.

articles.title: Scouted: This $11 Natural Deodorant Smells Like a Designer Perfume
articles.summary: Humble Brands introduced a new fragrance, Sweet Amber, for its aluminum-free deodorant. The new fragrance aims to offer an appealing scent option within the natural deodorant category.

articles.title: This $11 Natural Deodorant Smells Like a Designer Perfume
articles.author: Casey Clark
articles.summary: Humble Brands launched Sweet Amber, a new natural deodorant scent inspired by aromatherapy and crafted with amber extracted from fossilized Himalayan tree resin. The deodorant features notes of jasmine, vanilla, Nagarmotha, patchouli, and cedarwood, and is made with corn starch, baking soda, MCT oil, and beeswax, while also benefiting 1% for the Planet.

articles.title: The Galaxy Z Fold 7 has me excited for Samsung's Galaxy G Fold tri-fold
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 improvements spark excitement for the upcoming Galaxy G Fold, a tri-fold phone. The Galaxy G Fold may feature software optimized with Google's Android 16 and potentially use Silicon Carbon battery technology for increased density. It aims to match or surpass Huawei's Mate XT Ultimate Design in the tri-fold market.

articles.title: 'Uncle Bot' goes viral in China for lifelike moves and dadcore drip
articles.author: Aamir Khollam
articles.summary: Unitree has introduced the G1 humanoid robot, nicknamed 'Uncle Bot', which has gained popularity in China. The G1 is designed for advanced mobility, human interaction, and autonomous behavior, equipped with sensors, cameras, and multi-jointed limbs. The robot's public appearances have generated international interest in its capabilities, even though Unitree has not officially confirmed if the robot's popularity is part of an official marketing campaign.

articles.title: 2026 Subaru Uncharted EV Debuts With FWD And 300-Plus Miles Of Range
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Subaru launched its newest all-electric vehicle. The vehicle includes a surprising new option.

articles.title: Dyson V12 Detect Slim cordless vacuum is $200 off for a limited time with free shipping
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Dyson is offering the V12 Detect Slim cordless vacuum for $449.99, a $200 discount, with free shipping. The V12 Detect Slim combines powerful suction with innovative technology designed to reveal microscopic dust particles. It is powered by a Dyson Hyperdymium digital motor that spins at up to 125,000 rpm.

articles.title: Revitalize Your Skin: The 50+ Beauty Breakthrough
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Japanese cosmetics are revolutionizing skincare with essences like 'The Essence',setting new benchmarks for efficacy and sensory experience. Tatcha has played a crucial role in elevating the status of essences,redefining expectations for hydration. For people above 50 years of age, there is a beauty breakthrough using retinoids, peptides, hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C , Niacinamide and Ceramides.

articles.title: Turbologo Empowers First-Time Designers: From Idea to Icon – A User's Journey of Logo Creation Successes and Lessons
articles.summary: Turbologo, an AI logo generator, is highlighted as a beneficial tool for non-designers to create logos, offering features such as testing colors and comparing fonts. A user found Turbologo helpful in designing a logo for their handmade skincare business, allowing them to experiment and refine their brand's visual identity. The user iterated on their logo through the use of Turbologo and ultimately incorporated the logo in their website and product labels.

articles.title: This is how OpenAI COO Brad Lightcap defines AI agents
articles.author: Lakshmi Varanasi
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Agent, a new AI agent capable of autonomously handling complex tasks using its own computer. It combines the functionalities of Operator, Deep Research, and ChatGPT's conversational abilities. Major tech firms like Intuit and Salesforce are also integrating AI agents into their operations.

articles.title: Elon Musk's xAI may be working on a new meme generator for Grok: 'Something very cool is brewing'
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: xAI, Elon Musk's AI startup, is potentially developing a new meme generator for its Grok AI chatbot. Musk teased this development on social media, hinting at a new creative tool called 'Imagine' for creating viral videos. This follows the introduction of Grok's Aurora image generator in December 2024, which offers photorealistic rendering and multimodal input capabilities.

articles.title: Equator Launches EZ 4650 CV Marine Combo Washer-Dryer for Onboard Laundry Efficiency
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Equator Advanced Appliances launched the EZ 4650 CV Marine Combo Washer-Dryer. The product is intended for onboard laundry efficiency.

articles.title: Introducing Initial innovative washroom scenting
articles.summary: Initial Brunei has launched Signature Scent, a new hygiene solution featuring patented vibrating mesh technology. This non-electric scenting system disperses ultra-fine mist, offering long-lasting fragrance coverage for medium to large spaces and comes in three premium fragrances.

articles.title: Amazon is selling an 'outstanding' showerhead for $35, and shoppers say it's 'the best' they've ever had
articles.author: Alex James Kane
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the AquaDance 6-Setting Rainfall Showerhead for $35, a discount of $50 off its retail price of $85.

articles.title: I sent ChatGPT Agent out to shop for me
articles.author: Hayden Field
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Agent, an AI tool designed to handle complex, multi-step tasks for users. The agent is capable of tasks like finding products online (e.g., lamps on Etsy, flowers), but it cannot complete financial transactions or directly place orders on websites due to limitations in accessing personal accounts and external sites. It functions primarily as a research and guidance tool, rather than a fully autonomous task executor.

articles.title: Frozen Drinks at Home?
articles.author: Nick Guy
articles.summary: The Slushi is a new home slushie maker that turns drinks into frozen concoctions. It features five preset programs and a metal evaporator with a plastic auger for freezing. Ninja includes a manual with recipes and guidelines.

articles.title: One of the Most Exclusive Rolex Flexes on the Internet Isn't Even a Watch
articles.author: Ben Bowers
articles.summary: Rolex is offering a new product, Rolex Eau De Parfum, as a thank-you gift to select customers purchasing watches from authorized dealers. This perfume is not a standard offering, making it an exclusive and surprising bonus for some buyers.

articles.title: Walmart Is Selling an 'Amazing' $600 Portable Projector for $162, and Shoppers Say It Has 'Crisp Picture Quality'
articles.author: Cameron Cardwell
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the NBD Portable Projector at a flash deal price of $162, significantly reduced from its usual $600. This projector features full HD 1080p resolution, 4K support, WiFi 6, Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity, and integrated speakers, aiming to bring a theater experience anywhere.

articles.title: Nothing Launches Nothing Phone (3) And Headphone (1) At Museum Of The Future In Dubai
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: Nothing, a London-based technology company, officially launched its latest innovations.

articles.title: Reviewers Call This Famous Mop-Vac The ‘Best Invention Ever' — And It's Nearly 40% Off
articles.author: Tessa Flores
articles.summary: Tineco launched the Floor One S5, a smart vacuum-mop featuring a larger water tank and smart sensor technology for automatically adjusting suction and brush speed. The Floor One S5 gives users up to 35 minutes of operation per charge. It is available with a 38% off discount at Amazon.

articles.title: Infinix HOT 60 Pro+ Officially Launches, Setting a New Global Record for the Worlds Slimmest 3D-Curved Screen Phone
articles.author: Daily Trust
articles.summary: Infinix Nigeria has launched its HOT 60 Series, which includes the HOT 60 Pro+, HOT 60 Pro, and HOT 60i. The HOT 60 Pro+ is highlighted for its 5.95mm ultra-slim body and 3D-curved screen.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 fans can sign up to test secret new feature
articles.author: Liam Martin
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching a Playtest Program for a secret new feature related to Nintendo Switch Online, possibly for the Nintendo Switch 2. The program requires an active Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack account and is available in select regions for participants over 18. The test itself will run from July 28 until August 10.

articles.title: Here's how to get a free 'dirty soda' at Swig's first Louisiana location in Lafayette
articles.author: Staff writer
articles.summary: Swig, a popular drink shop chain, is opening its first Louisiana location in Lafayette and offering a free "dirty soda" to customers who sign up for text message alerts on their website. The new location is expected to open in 3 to 4 weeks.

articles.title: Shrink your doom-scrolling, literally
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: StackCommerce is offering the NanoPhone, a palm-sized Android smartphone, for $89.97 (originally $199.99) for a limited time. This phone runs Android 10 on a 3-inch touchscreen, supports apps like WhatsApp and Instagram, and features dual SIM support, 4G, Wi-Fi, and an all-day battery.

articles.title: Johnnie Walker Blonde Island Block Party: See What Went Down
articles.author: Bellanaija
articles.summary: Johnnie Walker introduced Johnnie Walker Blonde in Nigeria. Johnnie Walker designed the whisky for a new generation of expressive drinkers. Johnnie Walker celebrated the Nigerian debut with a dynamic celebration of music, flavour, and self-expression.

articles.title: This 'Quick and Quiet' $300 Countertop Ice Maker Is Now Only $200 at Walmart, and It's a Summertime Must-Have
articles.author: Cameron Le Blanc
articles.summary: Simzlife has launched the Countertop Nugget Ice Maker, now available at Walmart with a $150 discount. The ice maker produces 44 pounds of nugget ice in 24 hours and features a simple operation with cleaning program.

articles.title: Wayfair is selling a 'beautiful' $663 drawer dresser for $220, and shoppers say it has a 'quality build'
articles.author: Jon Winkler
articles.summary: Wayfair offers the Wade Logan Allyannah Drawer Dresser on sale. The dresser is designed to be stylish and functional, providing storage for outfits.

articles.title: Fortnite Got Milk
articles.author: Dairy MAX
articles.summary: Dairy MAX has released "Diner Tycoon". This signifies the introduction of a new product from Dairy MAX.

articles.title: Trader Joe's grocery store opening next week in Westminster
articles.author: Biz West staff
articles.summary: Trader Joe's will open a new store in Westminster's City Center Marketplace on July 25, expanding its services to a new location.

articles.title: Jesta I.S. Unveils Its Enhanced Customer Care Platform to Power Next-Level Service, and Transform How Clients Connect and Engage
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Jesta I.S. has launched a new customer care and intelligence platform leveraging Zendesk's AI-driven service technology. This aims to provide frictionless care to its clients in the fashion, apparel, footwear, and hard goods industries.

articles.title: Johnnie Walker Blonde Island Block Party: See What Went Down
articles.author: Bella Naija.com
articles.summary: Johnnie Walker has introduced its latest product, Johnnie Walker Blonde, to the Nigerian market. This lighter whisky is designed for mixing, particularly with lemonade, and is available in select stores and venues across Nigeria. The launch was celebrated with a dynamic event at the Island Block Party in Lagos, featuring musical performances and immersive experiences.

articles.title: Own the future: Tecno Spark 40 Series redefines cool for mid-range phones
articles.author: Guest Writer
articles.summary: TECNO has launched the SPARK 40 Series, including the SPARK 40, SPARK 40 Pro, and SPARK 40 Pro+, featuring an ultra-slim design and vibrant colors. The SPARK 40 Pro Plus is powered by the MediaTek Helio G200 chipset, offers up to 8GB RAM and 256GB storage, and includes a 50MP main camera and AI-enhanced features.

articles.title: The It-Girl-Approved Dyson Hair Tool I Use Every Single Day Is on Mega-Sale at Nordstrom
articles.author: Brooke Knappenberger
articles.summary: Dyson Airwrap I.D. offers blow dryer, curling iron, and hair dryer brush all in one. The Dyson Supersonic Nural dryer offers features like remembering styling preferences. Dyson Airstrait straightener dries and straightens hair using high-velocity airflow, all available at the Nordstrom Anniversary Sale.

articles.title: Tecno's Tri Fold Phone Concept Closes Inwards to Protect the Screen
articles.author: Afaq Wajdan Malik
articles.summary: Tecno has introduced the Phantom Ultimate G Fold, a new foldable concept device featuring an inward-folding, tri-fold design with dual-hinge system for enhanced screen protection and slim profile. The G Fold boasts a 9.94-inch main display, a battery capacity exceeding 5,000 mAh, and utilizes ultra-high-strength steel and Titan Fiber in its construction. Tecno plans to showcase the Phantom Ultimate G Fold at MWC 2026.

articles.title: 34 Personal Care Items You'll Wish You Found Years Ago
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: I Dew Care launched a dry shampoo powder to revive limp, greasy hair. SweatBlock released antiperspirant wipes for reducing underarm sweat for up to seven days. Catrice introduced "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, a tinted concealer with hyaluronic acid and shea butter. Revlon released an oil-absorbing volcanic face roller for reducing excess oil.

articles.title: Sony Bravia 2 Mark II TV review: A flagship-level upgrade for your living room
articles.author: Sourabh Kulesh
articles.summary: Sony has launched the Sony Bravia 2 Mark II television, an evolution from its predecessors, priced starting at Rs 69,990. The new TV features a flush, bezel-less display, immersive audio powered by Dolby Atmos and DTS, and a Premium Eco Remote with streaming service shortcuts. It also includes HDMI 2.1 ports for 4K resolution at 120Hz, targeting gamers and those prioritizing the latest technology.

articles.title: HBO Max is getting into thumbnail testing — 9 years after Netflix
articles.author: James Faris
articles.summary: Warner Bros. Discovery's HBO Max is introducing A/B testing for photo thumbnails, a feature already implemented by competitors like Netflix. The testing will initially involve popular TV shows and movies, with plans to expand it across the platform's catalog by the first half of 2026; AI will eventually be incorporated to scale thumbnail selection, but humans will remain involved.

articles.title: Zee to launch two new channels, expands regional focus
articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.summary: Zee Entertainment Enterprises Ltd (ZEEL) has launched two new regional channels, Zee Power and Zee BanglaSonar. Zee Power is a Kannada-language channel targeting younger viewers in Karnataka, while Zee BanglaSonar is a Bengali-language channel for viewers in West Bengal and beyond, with content curated for male audiences.

articles.title: I tested the Aldi robot vacuum against Amazon's top-rated Ultenic - I'm in love
articles.author: Jade Wright
articles.summary: Aldi has launched the Ambiano Robot Vacuum, priced at £99.99, as part of their new Life Hacks range. Ultenic offers the T20 Pro Robot Vacuum Cleaner for £239.99. The Ambiano is a bargain for hard floors, while the Ultenic T20 is better for bigger houses with varied surfaces.

articles.title: The Ultimate Guide to Liquid Lipsticks
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Carlton London launched Chuffed Kiss Liquid Lipsticks, offering high-pigment matte formula. Tint Cosmetics introduced Emily In Paris Liquid Lipstick with a moisturizing semi-matte finish. Maybelline New York offers Sensational Liquid Matte Lipstick featuring a lightweight and non-drying matte finish. Lakme released Forever Matte Liquid Lipstick, a transfer-proof, 16-hour long-lasting formula.

articles.title: Innoventure Global Partners Ltd Secures $30M to Build a Localized Platform Model in Southeast Asia
articles.summary: Innoventure's funding will support the launch of NOVALUXIA, a new e-commerce ecosystem focused on community-driven commerce. NOVALUXIA will first launch in the Philippines before expanding across Southeast Asia, and it is positioned as a user-driven, community-powered lifestyle ecosystem.

articles.title: OpenAI Unveils ‘Agent' Feature That Can Control Your Computer and Perform Tasks Automatically
articles.author: Ben Kew
articles.summary: OpenAI is launching ChatGPT Agent, a new tool designed to independently perform tasks using a built-in 'virtual computer.' Powered by a new, unnamed model, it can handle complex tasks such as planning a user's schedule, making purchases, and creating presentations by integrating tools like text and visual browsers.

articles.title: Elf Bar Dual 10K vs. Juicy Pod Novamax 10K: A Head-to-Head Comparison
articles.author: Ameyaw Debrah
articles.summary: Elf Bar introduced the Dual 10K, featuring a dual-tank design for flavor variety and QUAQ mesh coil technology. Juicy Pod launched the Novamax 10K with a focus on extended battery life, adjustable wattage, and eco-friendliness.

articles.title: ChatGPT Agents launches AI tool that will not only plan your breakfast, but also buy ingredients, and make spreadsheets
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: OpenAI is introducing new AI agent features to ChatGPT, including Operator and Deep Research, to simplify personal and professional tasks like planning travel or creating presentations. These features are available immediately to Pro, Plus, and Team subscribers, with plans for wider release later this summer.

articles.title: A CEO at 28: Chicago hair care company leader was groomed for success
articles.author: Mariah Rush
articles.summary: Tgin, a textured hair care company, is creating a new collection of products that will launch later this year. The brand is known for natural ingredients and popular products like Butter Cream Daily Moisturizer and Rose Water Smoothing Leave In Conditioner. Tgin also recently launched in Boots, one of the United Kingdom's largest health and beauty retailers.

articles.title: Fuzion Flooring Launches Hybrid Resilient with NXCORE: A Breakthrough in Sustainable Waterproof Flooring
articles.author: Fuzion Flooring
articles.summary: Fuzion Flooring has launched Hybrid Resilient with NXCORE, a new waterproof flooring product featuring a recyclable, non-PVC core. This flooring is designed for high-traffic environments and offers an environmentally responsible alternative to traditional vinyl flooring. It is available through Fuzion Flooring's distribution network across Canada.

articles.title: ChatGPT Agents: What We Know About the AI New Feature!
articles.author: Gilang Rahmatullah Akbar
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Agent, a new feature designed to automate complex tasks by interacting with the web. This advanced feature is available to users with ChatGPT Pro, Plus, and Team subscriptions, with Enterprise and Edu users gaining access soon.

articles.title: NESN LAUNCHES NEW, ENHANCED NESN 360 WITH SIMPLER, MORE CONNECTED EXPERIENCE
articles.author: View Lift
articles.summary: NESN has relaunched its NESN 360 app, enhanced by ViewLift, for iOS, Android, and connected TV platforms. The upgraded app features a redesigned experience and key improvements just in time for the Red Sox season.

articles.title: Transforming Digital Quality: Insights of a multinational QA leader
articles.summary: A major subscription-based media technology provider integrated AI-driven defect prediction models and test prioritization algorithms. This improved defect detection rates by 25%. The company also implemented AI-powered visual regression testing using Applitools Eyes, leading to a 30% reduction in visual defects and ensuring cross-device compatibility.

articles.title: TECNO SPARK 40 Series Hits The Market With The Slimmest AI-Enabled Device.
articles.author: akintayo eribake
articles.summary: TECNO has launched the Spark 40 series, featuring the SPARK 40 Pro and Pro Plus. The series operates on the Media Helio G200 processor and includes a 5200mAh battery with 45W fast charging and 30W wireless charging. The TECNO AI Smart Assistant is also included, and the phone comes with Corning Gorilla Glass 7i and a Super AMOLED 4500-nit display. It is available in major retail stores across Nigeria.

articles.title: Next £28 duvet set shoppers say is 'so crisp' and 'doesn't need ironing'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Next has launched the Textured Embossed Square Pattern Bedding Duvet Set, available in white or sage green. A single-sized set costs £28, with larger sizes available at higher prices. Customers praise the set for its crisp look, soft feel, and easy care, noting that it doesn't require ironing.

articles.title: Google launches AI Phone calls
articles.author: Farah Mokrani
articles.summary: Google has launched a new AI-powered feature in Google Search that allows its artificial intelligence to make calls on behalf of users to businesses like pet groomers, dry cleaners, and mechanics. The AI, powered by Gemini and Duplex models, gathers pricing and availability details and sends a summary to the user, also premium subscribers get access to experimental AI mode called Deep Search which allow users to request in-depth, multi-step reports about anything they like.

articles.title: Instamart's new ad delivers anything a home needs—big or small
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Instamart has launched a new advertising campaign, 'Big or Small, We Deliver It All,' showcasing its expanded product range, including home essentials, electronics, and personal care items. The campaign emphasizes Instamart's promise of delivering a broad selection of items within ten minutes, highlighting increased convenience for customers.

articles.title: Transform Your Laundry Routine With These Popular 14 Items
articles.author: Tessa Flores
articles.summary: DedCool introduced a luxury laundry soap scented like bergamot, transforming scents into non-toxic detergents. Tyler Candle Company's Glamorous Wash detergent, in the Diva scent, gained popularity for its lasting floral and fruity aroma. Napisan's Vanish, an Italian laundry detergent, was introduced with active oxygen bleach for stain removal and fabric care. Persil, a German detergent powder, was launched, promising to effectively clean and soften fabrics while also cleaning the washing machine.

articles.title: Samsung launches new AI-powered washer, dryer
articles.author: J Utopia 자산배분
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. launched the 2025 Bespoke AI Washing Machine and Bespoke AI Dryer, featuring the largest capacities in South Korea. The new models include AI-powered features such as customized wash cycles and drying algorithms tailored to fabric type.

articles.title: I tried toilet paper from Aldi, Tesco, M&S & more - 1 was softer than Andrex
articles.summary: Aldi introduced a "luxury" softer range of toilet rolls priced at £1.39. Lidl launched Floralys toilet roll, marketed as "luxury soft." M&S offers a super soft toilet roll retailing at 50p per roll, noted for its softness and thickness.

articles.title: HONOR Teases a Game-Changing Smartphone Built for Smart Living
articles.author: Publishing Partner
articles.summary: HONOR is launching a new smartphone featuring a dedicated AI Button, MagicOS 9.0 based on Android 15, and a 50MP Dual Camera. It features a 5300mAh battery with 35W HONOR SuperCharge and is launching in Pakistan on July 25, 2025.

articles.title: Shoppers love M&S fringed jacket that made one grandma feel like a rockstar
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: M&S is offering a fringed suede jacket priced at £59, which has received positive feedback from customers for its look and versatility.  A suedette version of the jacket features a fringed design on the front, back and sleeves to add a modern aesthetic.

articles.title: Popeyes in Birmingham open date announced as queues expected
articles.author: Kirsty Bosley
articles.summary: Popeyes is launching a new restaurant branch at Birmingham New Street Station on July 24th, offering New Orleans-style chicken and self-service kiosks. The launch includes promotions like free chicken sandwiches and merchandise for the first customers. A 'Brekkie' menu featuring British breakfast classics with New Orleans flavors will be available from July 25th.

articles.title: From wedding planning to online shopping, ChatGPT agent can do it all
articles.author: Alvin R Cabral
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new tool called "ChatGPT agent" on its ChatGPT platform, capable of handling complex tasks from start to finish. This new feature is available for paid subscribers, and it can connect to apps and interact with the web to complete tasks like planning a wedding or online shopping.

articles.title: Ex-Pilot Creates Robotic Kitchen For Food Lovers Short On Time
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Autochef, an Indian robotics company, plans to launch its robotic kitchen commercially soon. The system works through a fully customizable app that adapts to user preferences and tastes, delivering favorite dishes. The company is in its final beta-testing phase, and the first customers can expect a discount.

articles.title: Microsoft Dynamics 365
articles.summary: Graia, an Agentic AI platform, was launched by Bulb Technologies, Geomant, and Buzzeasy (Bosqar Invest group). Graia aims to transform customer service using empathy and advanced AI. The platform was unveiled on June 2.

articles.title: Instamart's latest Ad turns a home robbery into a comedy of convenience
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Instamart launched a new ad film titled 'Big or Small, We Deliver It All' to showcase its expanded product range, now offering over 35,000 items across categories like electronics, home appliances, and personal care, with a delivery time of 10 minutes. The campaign uses comedy to highlight this expanded range and the speed of delivery, reinforcing Instamart's identity and offerings.

articles.title: Amazon Has An 'Internet Famous' Section, And These Are 35 Of The Best Products On It Right Now
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies including Dr. Melaxin with "Peel Shot", Lottabody with Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse, Lumify with Eye Drops, Catrice with "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, L'Oreal Paris with Infallible 3-Second Setting Spray Mist, La Roche-Posay with Anthelios SPF 40 Tinted Sunscreen, Monday Haircare with Dry Shampoo, Clinique with Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in PINK Honey, Neutrogena with Rapid Clear Stubborn Acne Spot Treatment Gel, E.l.f's with Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara and Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops, L'Oréal Paris with Collagen Daily Face Moisturizer, Color Wow with Xtra Large Bombshell Volumizer, Jergens with Natural Glow Firming Self Tanner Body Lotion and Medicube with "Zero Pore" Pads launched new products or services.

articles.title: OpenAI quietly unveils new ChatGPT capabilities in latest update
articles.author: Pop Culture
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a major upgrade to ChatGPT on July 17, 2025, introducing a new 'agent' feature. This feature combines Operator and Deep Research into a unified system, enabling ChatGPT to complete real-world tasks online, like browsing, form filling, and research. It is available to Pro, Plus, and Team subscribers, with a broader rollout planned later.

articles.title: Proton all-new X50 draws 5,000 bookings in 10 days ahead of launch
articles.author: Faiqah Kamaruddin
articles.summary: Proton Holdings Bhd received 5,000 bookings for its all-new Proton X50 within 10 days of opening orders. The official launch with full pricing will be on July 24. The new Proton X50 features refreshed styling, a more powerful engine, an upgraded 14.6-inch infotainment display and debuts Bahasa Melayu voice recognition and an enhanced Level 2 Advanced Driver Assistance System.

articles.title: Sparkle: Local Laundry Sheet Cleans Up Market
articles.summary: Sparkle, a plastic-free laundry detergent, launched at The MarketPlace's Hamilton store and quickly became a top seller. It is available exclusively at MarketPlace stores, Supermart and Harrington Hundreds for $19.99. The MarketPlace Group partnered with Sparkle to drive its launch and supports local producers.

articles.title: Going the distance in a plug-in hybrid on a Malaysian road trip
articles.summary: BYD is introducing the Sealion 6 DM-i, a plug-in hybrid electric vehicle (PHEV) sport utility vehicle (SUV). The Sealion 6 DM-i is equipped with a petrol engine and an electric motor and can travel 1,100km on a full tank of fuel and a fully charged battery. Ahead of its official launch on July 16, The Straits Times had a chance to test drive the car.

articles.title: TECNO PHANTOM Ultimate G Fold Concept foldable mobile: Design and key features
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Tecno has introduced the Tecno PHANTOM Ultimate G Fold Concept, a new foldable smartphone. Tecno claims this device is the world's thinnest tri-fold smartphone, pushing the boundaries of mobile design.

articles.title: Burglars turn house helpers in Instamart's latest ad spot
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Instamart, Swiggy's quick-commerce platform, launched a campaign emphasizing its expanded product range of over 35,000 products and its commitment to rapid delivery. The campaign, titled 'Big or Small, We Deliver It All,' showcases the platform's ability to deliver diverse items quickly, from household goods to personal care essentials.

articles.title: Habi skincare has just arrived in Boots
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Boots has introduced HABI Skincare, an affordable skincare range focusing on hydration, protection, and glow, with every product under £8. The range includes the Moisture Melt Cleansing Balm, Sunny Shield SPF40 Lotion, Hydra Glow Hydrating Serum, and Hydra Boost Hydrating Moisturiser. Additionally, MySweetSmile has launched a teeth whitening range designed for wedding-related events.

articles.title: Saiyaara Poised to Break Box Office Records, Threatening Ek Villain's Lead
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Middo Ilbo has launched a new digital platform to revolutionize news consumption. Formula 1 has revamped its app and website offering a personalized fan experience. Both companies aim to enhance user engagement through personalized content delivery and improved user experiences.

articles.title: AGII Strengthens Infrastructure Sync Tools to Boost Developer Precision
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: AGII introduced new sync enhancements to improve contract coordination and responsiveness across AI-driven Web3 environments.

articles.title: 30 Walmart Products To Improve Your Yard
articles.author: Carlee Slay
articles.summary: Walmart introduces a range of new products for outdoor and garden spaces, including a white rocking chair, solar-powered mushroom house statue, garden-edging kit, and a fast-growing cypress tree. Additionally, Walmart's grocery selection offers convenient delivery for necessary ingredients.

articles.title: LG Washing Technology Integration Supports Smart Home Ecosystem Growth Across Gulf Markets
articles.summary: LG Electronics has launched a new range of AI-powered washing machines in the Gulf region. These washing machines feature LG's AI Core technology, including AI Direct Drive, AI Fabric Sensor, and AI Optimal Wash Cycle, designed to adapt intelligently to users' laundry needs. These washing machines also integrate with the LG ThinQ platform, enabling remote control and connectivity within a smart home ecosystem.

articles.title: OpenAI unveils new AI agent for ChatGPT
articles.author: The Federal
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a new AI agent for ChatGPT on July 17, designed to complete complex tasks. This new agent is available to ChatGPT's Pro, Plus, and Team subscribers and can execute tasks like ordering a wedding outfit, leveraging web interaction tools and external app integrations like Gmail and GitHub.

articles.title: Must-Have Body Lotions For Dry Skin That Nourish Deeply And Smell Divine
articles.summary: Several body lotions, including the Dot and Key Barrier Repair Hyaluronic Body Lotion, are presented as solutions for dry skin, offering deep nourishment, gentle scents, and skin barrier repair. These lotions, enriched with ingredients like cocoa butter, vitamin E, and hyaluronic acid, are promoted for their moisturizing properties and ability to leave skin soft, relaxed, and hydrated.

articles.title: Eveready Disrupts India's Flashlight Space; Launches Country's First Hybrid Torch
articles.summary: Eveready Industries has launched the Hybrid Torch, a dual-powered flashlight that uses both a rechargeable battery and AA batteries. The torch, priced at Rs.399/-, is available in red and green and is being promoted in collaboration with the film 'Nikita Roy' featuring Sonakshi Sinha.

articles.title: Nissan SUV Deal: Over $250,000 Discount vs. Kodiaq Price
articles.author: Senior Editor
articles.summary: Nissan has unveiled the X-Trail N-Trek, a new variant of the X-Trail SUV designed for adventure enthusiasts. It promises a blend of style and capability, building upon the X-Trail's versatility.

articles.title: 42 Superior Products You'll Try Once And Never Go Back
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several new products are launching, including Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, Catrice's "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, and E.l.f's Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara. Béis is also launching its Crescent Weekender Bag, and Built is releasing "Puff Protein Bars".

articles.title: Vidnoz AI Unveils Product Avatar and Interactive Avatar
articles.summary: Vidnoz AI has introduced Product Avatar and Interactive Avatar, new services aimed at enabling businesses to create scalable product videos and interactive customer service experiences. Product Avatar allows users to generate lifelike avatars holding product images, while Interactive Avatar offers a virtual assistant for 24/7 support with natural speech interaction and multilingual communication.

articles.title: Sinch Implements MCP Standard
articles.summary: Sinch has implemented the Model Context Protocol (MCP), a new service for AI agents. The MCP provides a standardized way for AI agents to execute actions across various systems, particularly in customer communications. Through the Sinch MCP server, AI agents can learn the specific requirements for each communication task.

articles.title: M&M's ‘It's More Fun Together' Brand Platform Taps into China's ‘Partner Culture'
articles.author: Bia Staff
articles.summary: M&M'S launched its global brand platform 'It's More Fun Together' in China. BBDO China developed a Douyin AI filter for the brand, which allows users to dress up with M&M'S characters. The campaign generated 310 million impressions on Douyin and over 90,000 AI sticker posts within 10 days.

articles.title: ChatGPT Will Soon Shop Online, Make Meal Planning And Presentations
articles.author: Rachel Metz
articles.summary: OpenAI is launching the 'ChatGPT agent,' a new feature designed to streamline personal and professional projects. This agent combines the capabilities of 'Operator' and 'Deep Research' AI services to perform complex tasks like planning meals, ordering ingredients, and creating presentations. The agent will be initially available to Pro, Plus, and Team subscribers, with wider release planned for enterprise and education customers later this summer.

articles.title: Appier Launches AdCreative.ai in Thailand to Drive Generative AI Transformation in Creative Marketing
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Appier has launched AdCreative.ai in Thailand, an AI-powered platform designed to help Thai brands accelerate creative production, enhance campaign performance, and scale personalized marketing. The solution integrates with Appier's existing AI product suite and has been adopted by brands like Food Passion Group and Rev Edition to improve marketing agility and efficiency.

articles.title: The future of brand storytelling - How AI-generated content is revolutionizing marketing
articles.author: Shashwat Vatsa
articles.summary: AI technologies such as Runway ML, Midjourney, and Sora are being implemented for professional-quality digital video commercial production, which reduces production time and costs.  The integration of AI in brand storytelling allows for personalized, dynamic, and engaging marketing content, transforming traditional marketing approaches. Olyv's AVP for brand underscores the company's engagement with these technologies.

articles.title: First Page Digital Elevates Traditional SEO with NexSEO, Empowering Brands To Be Visible Beyond Just Google
articles.author: PR Newswire Asia
articles.summary: First Page Digital has launched NexSEO, a new solution designed to help brands optimize for AI-powered answer engines like ChatGPT, Copilot, and Perplexity. NexSEO integrates SEO practices with content strategies, ensuring visibility in high-traffic AI platforms.

articles.title: Austin Geofence Battle: Waymo and Tesla Vie for Driverless Territory
articles.author: Senior Editor
articles.summary: A leading technology innovator unveiled a revolutionary AI engine designed for unprecedented personalization. This new system analyzes nuanced user interactions to craft bespoke digital journeys, promising more intuitive, responsive, and human-centric digital experiences.

articles.title: From Lululemon To Drunk Elephant: 36 Alternatives To Pricey Brand-Name Items That Are So Good, You May Say "Buh-Bye" To The Originals
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: E.l.f. introduced Hydrating Core Lip Shine, an alternative to Clinique's Black Honey, and Halo Glow Liquid Filter, a rival to Charlotte Tilbury's Flawless Filter. L'Oréal Paris launched Makeup True Match Lumi Glotion, competing with Drunk Elephant's bronzing drops, and BB Cream as an alternative to Dr. Jart+ Cicapair Color Correcting Cream. Dossier released Ambery Vanilla perfume inspired by YSL Black Opium, while Glossmetics presented Lychee Overnight Lip Mask comparable to Laneige's Lip Sleeping Mask. New products such as Catrice's Instant Awake Under Eye Brightener, Juno & Co.'s Clean 10 Cleansing Balm, and NYX matte setting spray were presented as alternatives to higher-end offerings.

articles.title: Godrej launches new range of AI-powered front load washing machines
articles.author: Daily Excelsior
articles.summary: Godrej has launched a new range of AI-powered front load washing machines with capacities from 6.5 kg to 10 kg. These machines feature AI technology for optimized washing, steam wash, refresh program, and can remove 100+ stains, drying clothes faster. The range includes features like auto tub clean reminders, overflow protection, anti-rust cabinet, 4-year comprehensive warranty and a 10-year motor warranty.

articles.title: AI's Impact on Slack: Transforming Workplace Communication
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Slack is launching 'AI Explain,' a new feature that uses AI to demystify technical jargon within the platform. Users can hover over unfamiliar terms and receive concise explanations, saving time and improving understanding. The feature represents Slack's commitment to leveraging AI to improve user experience and productivity.

articles.title: Shift from traditional search drives Yango Creator
articles.author: Lauren Mcnamara
articles.summary: Yango launched Yango Creator, a new division specializing in end-to-end influencer advertising. The division offers services like influencer strategy, content collaboration, campaign execution, and performance measurement. Yango aims to provide solutions for brands to be more discoverable in emerging search environments like TikTok and YouTube.

articles.title: France's Mistral adds new AI features to rival U.S. chatbots
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: Le Chat now allows users to interact with Mistral's AI generative model instead of typing, offering a new functionality through the "Voxtral" model.

articles.title: Nintendo Announces Return of Switch Online: Playtest Program
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Nintendo revealed the upcoming Nintendo Switch Online: Playtest Program. This announcement details a new service offering related to their existing online platform.

articles.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Agent to automate complex tasks: What it is capable of, who can use it and more
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT Agent, a new feature for the ChatGPT chatbot. This feature enables ChatGPT to handle tasks for users, such as planning events and building presentations.

articles.title: New vendo machines let Filipinos cut plastic waste, one refill at a time
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Sabon Express, a local refill company, launched its Blue Box soap and detergent vending machine at the BJMPMBAI Corporate Center on July 5th. The vending machine aims to provide Filipinos with a way to clean up their homes and habits sustainably.

articles.title: Perplexity's Comet is the AI browser Google wants
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Perplexity launched Comet, an AI-powered browser intended as an agentic answer to Google Chrome. Currently, the new browser is available to Perplexity Max subscribers or through an early access waitlist.

articles.title: Waiter told us 'someone smells lovely' after I wore DKNY perfume - get it for �5
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: DKNY's new perfume received a positive comment from a random person, who complimented the scent.

articles.title: AI's not-so-secret agents
articles.author: Info World
articles.summary: Google launched the Agent Development Kit, enabling users to create AI agents. Deutsche Telekom scaled its agent platforms for enterprise deployment.

articles.title: TikTok Launches Beta for New Songwriter Features to Elevate Music Creators
articles.author: The Source
articles.summary: TikTok has launched a beta version of its new Songwriter Features. These Features are a set of tools designed to enhance songwriting capabilities on the platform.

articles.title: Rwanda: Airtel Rwanda Launches Ai Spam Alert System to Curb Digital Fraud
articles.author: All Africa
articles.summary: Airtel Rwanda introduced "Africa's first Spam Alert Service." This new service aims to protect users from spam.

articles.title: Call Of Duty 2027 will launch new franchise with martial arts theme says leaker
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Activision is planning to launch a new product.

articles.title: OpenAI's ChatGPT Agent Launch Heralds a Future Powered by Agentic AI
articles.author: Technowize Magazine
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a new AI agent for Pro, Plus, and Team plan subscribers. This ChatGPT agent can execute various digital actions on behalf of the user, combining remote browser capabilities and web synthesis with conversational AI.

articles.title: Meta's new AI lets you imagine and create in any setting, now free in India
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Meta's new AI, designed for imaginative creation in diverse settings, is now available for free in India. This AI service allows users to generate content.

articles.title: Club JSX: Why Can't Offering A Great Airline Experience Be Enough?
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: JSX has launched its first loyalty program. This new program represents the company's initial foray into loyalty-based service offerings.

articles.title: Premium Pints Go Portable: Luxury Ice Cream Brands Bet On Convenient Formats
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Alec's Ice Cream, RoseBud Ice Cream, and Jeni's Ice Cream are actively impacting the novelty ice cream category. These companies are 'making a dent', potentially indicating the introduction or influence of their new products or service.

articles.title: NESN LAUNCHES NEW, ENHANCED NESN 360 WITH SIMPLER, MORE CONNECTED EXPERIENCE
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: NESN has relaunched its NESN 360 app, offering an upgraded sports streaming experience. The updated app features new functionalities, an improved user interface, and greater stability to meet the demands of sports fans.
